3 ROSAgent::ROSAgent(size_t id)
4 {
5  agentId = id;
6  std::stringstream initServerName;
7  initServerName << "initAgentServer_" << id;
8  ros::ServiceClient client = n.serviceClient<ORCAStar::Init>(initServerName.str());
9  ros::service::waitForService(initServerName.str());
10  ORCAStar::Init srv;
11 
12  if (client.call(srv))
13  {
14  client.shutdown();
15  ROS_DEBUG("Agent %lu Parameters received!", id);
16  }
17  else
18  {
19  ROS_ERROR("Agent %lu Parameters not received!", id);
20  exit(-1);
21  }
22 
23  options = new EnvironmentOptions(CN_DEFAULT_METRIC_TYPE, CN_DEFAULT_BREAKINGTIES,
24  CN_DEFAULT_ALLOWSQUEEZE, CN_DEFAULT_CUTCORNERS,
25  CN_DEFAULT_HWEIGHT, CN_DEFAULT_TIME_STEP, srv.response.delta);
26 
27  param = new AgentParam(srv.response.sightRadius,srv.response.timeBoundary,srv.response.timeBoundaryObst,
28  srv.response.radius, CN_DEFAULT_REPS, srv.response.speed, srv.response.agentMaxNum, 0);
29 
30  Point start = {srv.response.start.x, srv.response.start.y};
31  Point goal = {srv.response.goal.x, srv.response.goal.y};
32 
33 
34  std::vector<std::vector<Point>> obstacles;
35 
36  for(auto &obst : srv.response.Obstacles)
37  {
38  std::vector<Point> tmp;
39  for(auto &vert : obst.points)
40  {
41  tmp.push_back({vert.x, vert.y});
42  }
43  obstacles.push_back(tmp);
44  }
45 
46 
47  size_t w, h;
48  float cs;
49  std::vector<std::vector<int>> grid;
50 
51  ros::ServiceClient mapClint = n.serviceClient<nav_msgs::GetMap>("static_map");
52  nav_msgs::GetMap mapSrv;
53 
54  if(mapClint.call(mapSrv))
55  {
56  mapClint.shutdown();
57  ROS_DEBUG("Agent %lu Map received!", id);
58  }
59  else
60  {
61  ROS_ERROR("Agent %lu Map not received!", id);
62  exit(-1);
63  }
64 
65  w = mapSrv.response.map.info.width;
66  h = mapSrv.response.map.info.height;
67  cs = mapSrv.response.map.info.resolution;
68 
69  for(size_t i = 0; i < h; i++)
70  {
71  grid.push_back(std::vector<int>(w, 0));
72  for(size_t j = 0; j < w; j++)
73  {
74  if(mapSrv.response.map.data[j + w * (h - i - 1)] == 100)
75  {
76  grid[i][j] = 1;
77  }
78  else
79  {
80  grid[i][j] = 0;
81  }
82  }
83  }
84  map = new Map(cs, grid, obstacles);
85 
86 
87  ROS_DEBUG("Map %lu Created!", id);
88 
89  agent = new ORCAAgent(0, start, goal, *map, *options, *param);
90  agent->SetPlanner(ThetaStar(*map, *options, agent->GetStart(), agent->GetGoal(), param->radius + param->rEps));
91  agent->InitPath();
92 
93  ROS_DEBUG("Agent %lu Created!", id);
94 
95  std::stringstream inpTopicName;
96  inpTopicName << "AgentInput_" << id;
97  std::stringstream outTopicName;
98  outTopicName << "AgentOutput_" << id;
99 
100  ROSAgentSub = n.subscribe(inpTopicName.str(), 1000, &ROSAgent::DoStep, this);;
101  ROSAgentPub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Point32>(outTopicName.str(), 1000);;
102 
103 
104  ROS_DEBUG("Agent %lu Topics Created!", id);
105 
106  ros::spin();
107 
108 }

113 void ROSAgent::DoStep(const ORCAStar::ORCAInput &msg)
114 {
115 
116 
117  agent->SetPosition({msg.pos.x, msg.pos.y});
118  agent->SetVelocity({msg.vel.x, msg.vel.y});
119  Map emptymap = Map();;
120 
121  for(size_t i = 0; i < msg.neighbours.pos.size(); i++)
122  {
123  AgentParam nParam = *param;
124  nParam.radius = msg.neighbours.rad[i];
125  Agent *tmpAgent = new ORCAAgent(static_cast<int>(i + 1),Point(), Point(), emptymap, *options, nParam );
126  Point nPos = {msg.neighbours.pos[i].x, msg.neighbours.pos[i].y};
127  Point nVel = {msg.neighbours.vel[i].x, msg.neighbours.vel[i].y};
128 
129  tmpAgent->SetPosition(nPos);
130  tmpAgent->SetVelocity(nVel);
131 
132  float distSq = (agent->GetPosition()-nPos).SquaredEuclideanNorm();
133  agent->AddNeighbour(*tmpAgent, distSq);
134  }
135 
136  agent->UpdatePrefVelocity();
137  agent->UpdateNeighbourObst();
138 
139 
140  agent->ComputeNewVelocity();
141  agent->ApplyNewVelocity();
142 
143 
144  geometry_msgs::Point32 vel;
145  vel.x = agent->GetVelocity().X();
146  vel.y = agent->GetVelocity().Y();
147 
148  for(auto &n : neighbous)
149  {
150  delete n;
151  }
152 
153  neighbous.clear();
154 
155  ROS_DEBUG("Agent %lu Do Step!", agentId);
156  ROSAgentPub.publish(vel);
157 }
